Sorry, I thought you opened the door.  I'll repost that then)

::Spears::

She stood there, looking threw the small hole.  She started crying.  
She turned to Prebon. "Please let him go."  It took all her strength 
to ask him. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> OOC: Logo, I only opened the peep hole. You can only look at 
Striker. 
> You can't go to him.
